identity.name: BrainPath
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion of Nostalgia (Comic Sans) + Futurism (AI/Neon). Tension creates interest.

typography.primary_font: Comic Sans MS, Comic Sans, cursive
typography.secondary_font: Comic Sans MS, Comic Sans, cursive
typography.rationale: Embracing the constraint. Comic Sans is the 'handwritten' element on the 'digital' blackboard. We treat it with extreme respectâ€”massive sizing, tight tracking for headlines, and generous line-height for body.

layout_strategies.spacing_scale: Relaxed. Use gap-8 or gap-12 between major sections.
layout_strategies.alignment: Left-aligned text for readability, Centered Hero for impact.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,211,238,0.5)] transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105

cards.style: bg-card border border-border/50 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: bg-input/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all duration-200

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay (opacity 90%)

login_background.alt: Abstract digital art blue and white
login_background.usage: Split screen login page - Right side image

general: STRICTLY use Comic Sans MS for all text. If not available, fallback to 'cursive'.
Implement the 'Digital Chalkboard' aesthetic: Dark backgrounds, bright neon accents, rounded corners.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (glows, scale up).

specific_pages.landing: Hero section must use the 'hero_background' image with a heavy dark overlay. The headline 'BrainPath' should be massive (text-7xl) and glowing.
specific_pages.auth: Use a split-screen layout. Left side: Form (Glassmorphism). Right side: 'login_background' image.
specific_pages.dashboard: Use a Bento Grid. Top left: Welcome (Span 2). Top right: Stats (Span 1). Bottom: Topic Selection (Span 3).
specific_pages.learning_view: Focus mode. Hide sidebar/distractions. Center the content (Passage/Video). Use large typography for readability.

animations: Add 'framer-motion' for page transitions (fade in, slide up).
Animate progress bars with a 'filling' effect.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors with subtle noise textures.
Ensure contrast ratios are met (Neon on Dark is usually good, but check).
Use 'rounded-3xl' for a friendly, organic feel.
